trans-unit.source: Main Categories: You should only select categories of one level. The UID of their parent should be set in rootCategory of TS-Template.
trans-unit.target: Main Categories: You should only select categories of one level. The UID of their parent should be set in rootCategory of TS-Template.

trans-unit.source: Page UID for the event location
trans-unit.target: Page UID for the event location

trans-unit.source: Page UID with events2 plugin to manage event records
trans-unit.target: Page UID with events2 plugin to manage event records

trans-unit.source: Page UID of the search results
trans-unit.target: Page UID of the search results

trans-unit.source: List amount of records (only for view: latest events)
trans-unit.target: List amount of records (only for view: latest events)

trans-unit.source: Merge events with multiple times at same day to one entry
trans-unit.target: Merge events with multiple times at same day to one entry

trans-unit.source: Example: 17.07.2020 08:00 and 20:00 will be merged to just one entry without any time information, but with a hint, that there are multiple time entries available in detail view.
trans-unit.target: Example: 17.07.2020 08:00 and 20:00 will be merged to just one entry without any time information, but with a hint, that there are multiple time entries available in detail view.

trans-unit.source: Merge recurring events to one entry
trans-unit.target: Merge recurring events to one entry

trans-unit.source: Example: 17.07., 18.07., 22.07. will be merged to 17.07.-22.07. with a hint to look into detail view for exact dates.
trans-unit.target: Example: 17.07., 18.07., 22.07. will be merged to 17.07.-22.07. with a hint to look into detail view for exact dates.

trans-unit.source: Show a filter selection for organizers in Frontend
trans-unit.target: Show a filter selection for organizers in Frontend

trans-unit.source: Filter will only be displayed, if there are at least 2 Organizers available
trans-unit.target: Filter will only be displayed, if there are at least 2 Organizers available

trans-unit.source: It's possible to cut the output into two peaces. That way you can display images on top of page, the event output at bottom and other content in between.
trans-unit.target: It's possible to cut the output into two peaces. That way you can display images on top of page, the event output at bottom and other content in between.

trans-unit.source: Selectable categories for new events in Frontend
trans-unit.target: Selectable categories for new events in Frontend
